snippet.title: Transformers Galactic Trials | Launch Trailer | OUT NOW
snippet.description:
The time has come to roll out! 🎉Race with iconic AUTOBOTS and DECEPTICONS including Optimus Prime, Bumblebee, Megatron and Soundwave, in TRANSFORMERS: Galactic Trials, out now on PC, Xbox, Playstation and Nintendo Switch 🎮

Experience unique hybrid gameplay in this racing adventure game with rogue-lite elements! Play solo in the Galactic Trials and collect 70 Prime Relics to level-up speed, damage and handling, or challenge a friend in Arcade Mode with 2-player local multiplayer. Fans can also keep a look-out for Easter Eggs inspired by the entire 40 year history of the TRANSFORMERS franchise! 🚗🤖


Watch the Full Transformers Series: - The Transformers - The Transformers: The Movie - Transformers: The Headmasters - Transformers: Super-God Masterforce - Transformers: Victory - Transformers: Zone - Transformers: Generation 2 - Beast Wars: Transformers - Beast Wars II - Beast Wars II: Lio Convoy's Close Call! - Beast Wars Neo - Beast Machines - Transformers: Robots in Disguise (2001) - Transformers: Armada - Transformers: Energon - Transformers: Cybertron - Transformers: Animated - Transformers: Cyber Missions - Transformers: Prime - Transformers: Rescue Bots - Transformers Go! - Transformers Prime Beast Hunters: Predacons Rising - Transformers: Robots in Disguise (2015) - Transformers: Rescue Bots Academy - Transformers: Combiner Wars - Transformers: Titans Return - Transformers: Power of the Primes - Transformers: Cyberverse - Transformers: War For Cybertron Trilogy: Siege - Transformers: War For Cybertron Trilogy: Earthrise - Transformers: War For Cybertron Trilogy: Kingdom
